channel.title: MTG Cardlinker
channel.description: A Greasemonkey userscript for automatically linking of Magic: The Gathering cards on webpages

item.title: Morningtide support
item.description: Now the cards from the new expansion Morningtide are inlcuded in the scripts. Users should get a message about it automatically.

item.title: Added SvenskaMagic.com bookmarklet
item.description: I've added a bookmarklet to the site. It can be used to easily apply card tags on multiple card names for the site SvenskaMagic.com

item.title: Added link to GreaseKit for Safari
item.description: I've added a link to GreaseKit to this site to enable Safari-users to also benefit from the userscripts. If it work? No idea - haven't got a mac myself...

item.title: Initial release of international scripts
item.description: Today I've released this userscript in two non-swedish versions. One links card names to Wizards of the Coast's Gatherer's popups and the other links to MagicCards.info's popups. Both scripts are up to date with the swedish script released yesterday, which means that they got the new engine and all card names of physical cards ever released, including Lorwyn, Unhinged and Unglued.
